title: Cancer

verbs: To take part in a sexual act.
To take part in sexual activity (most commonly sexual intercourse) with another person for the purposes of sexual pleasure.
To have sexual intercourse, to copulate.
To take part in sexual intercourse.
To have sex, sexual relations with someone
nouns: Sixty-nine or 69, also known by its French name soixante-neuf, is a group of sex positions in which two people align themselves so that each person's mouth is near the other's genitals, simultaneously performing oral sex.
Oral sex practiced simultaneously by two people
A sex position facilitating mutual oral sex
A sex position where two people give each other oral sex at the same time.
A sexual position which provides for simultaneous mutual oral sex.

description: The Cancer astrological sign in the Zodiac. This Zodiac Symbol represents a Crab.
apple_vendor_description: As presented on Apple devices, the Cancer zodiac emoji is a beautifully rendered crab with a pearly, slightly iridescent shell, showcasing Apple's characteristic 3D shading and realistic lighting. Its claws are poised with a delicate strength, and the overall design has a soft, rounded aesthetic that feels both playful and elegant. This emoji, with its unique Apple interpretation, symbolizes the traits associated with the Cancer sign, such as nurturing, intuition, and emotional depth, often used in discussions about astrology or personal characteristics.
